title: 212: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: FANTASY SUITES
itunes:title: 212: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: FANTASY SUITES
description:
It is part 1 of Tayshia’s Bachelorette Finale and The Broads chat about the Fantasy Suites! They discuss all their emotions: shock, sadness, arousal, joy, heartbreak, frustration, confusion, and more. They talk about Ivan’s ice bath, Zac’s masterpiece, Brendan’s Neil Lane experience, a heartbreaking breakup, Ben being back, trying to read Tayshia, and much more! 


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
